name: Funimation Dark Mode
description:
DEPRECATED ============ Funimation is discontinuing streaming on its site and is moving all of its streaming content to its subsidiary, Crunchyroll. As such this will no longer be maintained. Read more on Funimation's blog https://blog.funimation.com/2022/03/01/funimation-content-moving-to-crunchyroll-for-worlds-largest-anime-library ============ This will restyle Funimation to remove the harsh, bright white colors, making it easier on the eyes.

It also makes the video player bigger, to make it easier to watch without being in fullscreen.
additional_info: Video options popover was missing dark styles
